plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm a yummy snack for rabbits!
🥕 I grow under the soil.
😋 I'm often orange.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have leaves that change color.
🐿️ Squirrels climb on me.
🍂 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I grow in a garden.
🌷 People give me as a gift.
🐝 I attract bees with my nectar.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree. I am red, yellow, or green. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me.
🥧 People make pie with me.
💪 An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

plant.question: I am long and green. I grow on a vine and you can eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and good in salads.
🥪 You can make pickles from me.
🌱 I need lots of sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am a plant that has thorns. I make beautiful flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often red, pink, or white.
🌹 People give me as a sign of love.
🌵 Be careful of my sharp thorns!

plant.question: I am a big, yellow fruit that grows on a tree in warm places. Monkeys love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow where it's sunny!
🐒 Monkeys peeling me is a funny sight!
😋 My flavor is best in smoothies!

plant.question: I am a leafy plant that grows close to the ground. You walk on me outside. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play games on me.
🐄 Cows sometimes eat me.
🌿 I am green and soft under your feet.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a palm tree. People use me to make milk and oil. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I am very hard to crack open!
🌴 I grow near the beach.
🥛 You can drink my juice!

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows many yellow kernels that people and animals love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am used to make popcorn!
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me.
🐥 Animals love to eat me!

cosmos.question: I shine bright at night. I'm round and white, and you can sometimes see me during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 You see me in the sky at night.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese!
🐺 Werewolves like me.

cosmos.question: I am big and hot, and give Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I am out.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the sky and I'm very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am smaller than the moon.
🌠 You can wish upon me.
🌃 You see lots of me at night.

cosmos.question: I am where you live! I have land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am round like a ball.
🏡 You can find your house on me.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas far away. I have rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am a planet.
💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am very big and made of gas.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky. People want to visit me one day. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am a planet.
🔴 I am the color of fire trucks
👽 Some people think aliens live on me.

cosmos.question: I am a star, but I am not the Sun. I am the closest star to our Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am a star, like many others!
🔥 I am not as bright as the Sun!
🔭 I am difficult to see without a telescope, and I am far, far away!

cosmos.question: I’m a group of stars that makes a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some people draw me as a bear!
🌌 You need to look closely to see me.
✨ I am made of many stars!

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, dust, and gas. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 The Milky Way is one of me!
✨ I am huge!
🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular!

cosmos.question: I am a long, icy object that orbits the Sun. I have a tail when I get close. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am often called a dirty snowball.
☀️ The sun helps form my tail!
🧊 I am made of ice, dust and gas.
